item.title: Bridging the Skills Gap: Innovation in Journalism Education
item.description: There’s a skills gap between traditional journalism education and training and the emerging requirements of the industry.

item.title: Data and Computational Journalism
item.description: Data, algorithms, chatbots and computational journalism impacting on newsrooms, are you ready?

item.title: Recoding journalism education: mind the skills gap, please!
item.description: Fake news, open data, algorithms and news room experimentation mean there’s a need to train journalists beyond the basics.

item.title: The First Commit of History: Visualising News on a Deadline
